engine
Class GameEngine

java.lang.Object
  engine.GameEngine

public class GameEngine
extends Object

GameEngine to run Simulations and tournaments using the Brain and World objects specified. Also, this class has various methods to aid in the control of the speed of execution of Simulations. sortByFitness is needed by the GeneticAlgorithm, it must order the population by how good they are at winning games, best first To work out get the winner in a game, call world.getFoodInAnthills() or world.survivingAntsBySpecies() both return an int[], where index 0 == black and 1 == red high numbers are better for both

Version:
1.0
Author:
pkew20 / 57116

getSleepDur

public long getSleepDur()
getSleepDur to return the length of time Simulations should pause between step calls to their World

Returns:
the sleep duration for Simulations, in milliseconds

setSleepDur

public void setSleepDur(int sleepDur)
setSpeed to allow the altering of the amount of time waited by Simulations after each World step

Parameters:
sleepDur - the amount of time to set as sleepDur

expScale

public static int expScale(int x)
expScale to alter the scale of a value so as to make values from 0 to 1000 in a more balanced order, so there is not a sudden increase after 0

Parameters:
x - should be between 0 and 1000, but is not checked
Returns:
a value between 1 and 1000 proportional to 2^x

log2

public static double log2(int x)
log2 to perform a log of base 2

Parameters:
x - the value to be logged
Returns:
log base 2 of x

contestSetup

public void contestSetup(Brain[] population)
                  throws IllegalArgumentEvent
contestSetup to setup a contest that may later be stepped through, using the Brain population given

Parameters:
population - an array of Brain objects to be used to start a contest
Throws:
IllegalArgumentEvent - if there are less than 2 Brains in the population

fitnessContestSetup

public void fitnessContestSetup(Brain[] population,
                                Brain absoluteTrainingBrain)
fitnessContestSetup to setup a contest that may later be stepped through, using the Brain population given and the Brain given

Parameters:
population - an array of Brain objects to be used to start a contest
absoluteTrainingBrain - the Brain to test the Brains in the population against

fitnessContestStep

public void fitnessContestStep(Stack<World> worlds,
                               String goal)
                        throws IllegalArgumentEvent
fitnessContestStep to perform one set of Simulations for one of the Brains in the population, this method must be called (population.length) times to obtain comparissons for all Brains in the population given

Parameters:
worlds - must contain at least 2 Worlds, or at least 4 if the Brain does not have a fitness value
goal - the attribute to maximize, such as food or kills
Throws:
IllegalArgumentEvent - if the GameEngine's goal is invalid

contestStepAll

public void contestStepAll()
contestStepAll automatically runs entire contest, with the default seed 1 world

contestStepAll

public void contestStepAll(World world)
contestStepAll to automatically run the entire contest

Parameters:
world - a single template World

contestStep

public void contestStep(Stack<World> worlds)
contestStep to perform one set of Simulations for one of the Brains in the population, this method must be called (population.length) times to obtain comparissons for all Brains in the population given

Parameters:
worlds - must contain at least (population.length - 1) Worlds

simulate

public GameStats simulate(Brain blackBrain,
                          Brain redBrain,
                          World world)
simulate to runs a standard simulation using the Brains and World given, and to log the result, which can also be obtained from the World or Brains

Parameters:
blackBrain - the Brain to be given to the black Ants
redBrain - the Brain to be given to the red Ants
world - the World in which the Brains should be played
Returns:
statistics on the simulation, such as food placement at the end

main method used to initiate genetic algorithm evolution

Parameters:
args - unused
